response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us, reflecting its high quality, functionality, and unique features. Given its worth to you stands at $8,000, I propose we find a mutually beneficial arrangement. My offer to you is $12,000 for this remarkable product. I believe this price strikes a fair balance between the value we place on it and the value you see in it. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier solution.", "product_price": 12000}
